title: Secretary

credit_line: Ailsa Mellon Bruce Fund, and the following, by exchange: Gifts of Barbara Ackerman, James Berkman, Richard Berkman, Helen Habbert, and Susan Rahm; George Leary; Henry Oliver Rea Charitable Trust; Mr. and Mrs. Richard M.
